meanings.sent3: The old lamp seemed to reglow every time it was turned on, as if it had a secret power.
meanings.sent4: Her smile made her whole face reglow with happiness, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The embers of the campfire started to reglow as the logs were rearranged, casting a warm light around the campsite.
